title: Rational and Polynomial Functions - Characteristics - Part C

content.question: Part C Determine if the graph of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>h</mi> </math> has any horizontal asymptotes or slant asymptotes. Find the slopes for those asymptotes, or state that no horizontal asymptotes or slant asymptotes exist.

frqParts.text: Part C Determine if the graph of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>h</mi> </math> has any horizontal asymptotes or slant asymptotes. Find the slopes for those asymptotes, or state that no horizontal asymptotes or slant asymptotes exist.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
